attributes.title: Unsatisfied
attributes.review: I was under the impression that this app would give me the superhuman power to hurl my foreign neighbors from a fifth story window. Having downloaded the app, it had come to my attention that my strength is unchanged. I have also suddenly lost the respect of my friends and family. While this may be because of my decisions and not the app, I am disappointed that Mr. Trump has not personally slashed through my problems with a machete. Of course, I’m keeping the app, as I’m waiting for the president to show up with a boom box outside my window, but know that you could have done better. (Don’t tell Donny I’m playing hard to get. I want him to work for so that the moment our lips meet will be all the more sweet.)

attributes.title: this ain’t it
attributes.review: so, i heard about this app from TikTok. Of course, being the person that I am, I decided it would be an AMAZING decision to download the app to support our orange president. However, the is app was an absolute FAILURE. (I’m not surprised as Trump lacks basic common knowledge required for pretty much everything) When I downloaded the app, I was met with a big fat picture of a man with orange skin and wrinkles. Suddenly, he came out of the screen and chased me down around the house! Out of nowhere, troompa loompas tried to break my windows but luckily I knew how to fight them off. They all ended up with broken noses. Anyways, in conclusion our president is racist, a white supremacist and a horrible president overall. BLACK LIVES MATTER. #BreonnaTaylor #ICANTBREATHE #GeorgeFloyd

attributes.title: absolutely NASTY 🤮
attributes.review: I opened the app and the next day i heard a knock on my door. it was trump, but there was something off. i think maybe he got a spray tan that went awry or maybe it was just an impersonator. whoever it was, this trump character came into my house to personally thank me for downloading his app. my mom came out to see what was going on and immediately became nauseated and started spewing bile all over the place. my sister came out to see what was going on and the SAME THING happened. all this vomit triggered my dog who pooped while staring at trump, ate it, then regurgitated it at trump’s feet. my cat started meowing the most horrible meow and retching in the corner. i now have a migraine and a home covered ceiling to floor in fecal matter and vomit. DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP!!!

attributes.title: Absolutely terrible!
attributes.review: This app supports a racist want to be dictator that cares more about money than people’s health and well-being. Instead of doing mail voting to keep people safe from the coronavirus he wants to do public pools instead because he doesn’t care about the health and well-being of others and he just wants a better chance of winning. He hoping that if he acts like the coronavirus is not a big deal that his supporters will come to the polls and his non-supporters will not which will make him more likely to win. Therefore,  rigging the polls! Also he’s not doing one single thing about Black Lives Matter and is sending police to attack peaceful protesters which is terribly wrong! He’s a violating the Constitution.

attributes.title: Can’t say I liked it
attributes.review: Truly a terrible👁👄👁, terrible app. 🤮🤮🤮 I open the app to see one disgusting looking man. He was so... orange 🧡🧡I was terrified😰. In shock. He told me that I was ugly 🤪and deserved 🤬 to die 😹. I don’t deserve die right? Someone pls tell me 😿I don’t. He went on 👿 to call me 🤷‍♀️racial slurs and 🥶that really hurt me 💀. Then he said my 💩 favorite tiktoker 🖕Charli Disneyland was fat. And I was like “Uh no she’s not.” 🦷Then I was 🗣 wait no yes her. He went 👩‍🍳on to say I 🧚‍♂️was beautiful. And I 👩‍❤️‍💋‍👩 felt so validated🙈. The he 🦋said SIKE. ✨In that moment 🌚 I wanted to die. How could he🔥🔥🔥 say that.☔️ He said🍔 my mom was fat😔 and then spit on us threw the screen. 😤😤How? I don’t🤔 know it must💞 have been magic☪️. “I got the magic in me” ❌❌oh sorry I 🙇🏿‍♀️really like that song. 😃

attributes.title: No😖🖕
attributes.review: If I could I would rate this app a zero here’s my reasoning: I just opened the app to see what trump was doing but when I opened the app I saw a crusty naked Cheeto stripping😫 on a pole with my pet rat remy🐀. When he noticed I saw that, he dragged me by the feet😱, took of my shoe and socks, the proceeded to lick me toes🤬. I thought my pet rat, remy🐀 was gonna try to get the crusty Cheeto off me but then he started to pin me down😕, helping the crusty Cheeto😡. I screamed to remy🐀 telling him to help me, while being immobile😖, I realized that the musty crusty dusty Cheeto🤮 did a séance to force my pet rat Remi🐀to help him while he licks my toes👣. I was able to get away sadly leaving my pet rat remi🐀 in the poor hands of the nasty smelling fat Cheeto🤮😡🖕. Pls help me shut down this app and help rescue my poor REMYYYYY🐀😖

attributes.title: Trump killed my 169 year old grandmother with his app!!
attributes.review:
I downloaded this app to support our favorite Oompa loompa man! But instead my 69 year old toddler started chatting " all lives matter" which was disgusting, he should know that all lives won't matter until black lives do✊🏼✊🏽✊🏾✊🏿!!! Then he started strip dancing to the National Anthem!!!!!!!! A police officer broke into my house and started a fist fight with my husband Chad! But that's not all that bad, I still have my girlfriend Karen. Anyways, the man himself, bunker boy then came in through my roof telling me if I don't vote for him he'll kill my pet rock!!!! Which he can't do!!!! I still had to walk her😠😠😠😠😠😠😠.  That's my 📖 
                  
                       Signed

                         - Arrest Breonna Taylor's murders ✨
